pages.text: $(#008cff)Moon Acolytes$() will knock you back and levitate you when they attack.
$(#008cff)Crystalline Sprites$() are a flying mob that fires beams at nearby players.
$(#8800ff)The Moon Queen$() is the boss of $(#008cff)The Moon Temple$(). She will circle you with her shield up and perform shield charges to knock you up in the air!
